description: Pras alleges that his longtime bandmate shorted the band on live income, as well as rejecting and dropping out of lucrative shows
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Broken Social Scene Share Trailer for New Documentary It’s All Gonna Break: Watch
description: Directed by Stephen Chung, the film documents the early years of the Canadian band and the creation of its first three albums
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Waxahatchee Shares Video for New Song “Much Ado About Nothing”: Watch
description: Katie Crutchfield’s first new music since her great March album Tigers Blood
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Jamie xx Announces Huge International Tour
description: A run of dates in North and South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia will go through March 2025
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Bartees Strange Announces New Album Horror, Shares Video for New Song “Sober”: Watch
description: The musician worked on his second 4AD studio LP with Jack Antonoff and Yves and Lawrence Rothman
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Geordie Greep Adds Tour Dates, Shares New Song “Blues”: Listen
description: The Black Midi alum shares a second single—and live video—from debut album The New Sound
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Florist Announce Tour, Share New Song “This Was a Gift”: Listen
description: The New York band’s “love song about enduring difficult seasons of life with the people that we keep close” follows the 2022 album Florist
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Unwound’s Sara Lund Diagnosed With Breast Cancer, Crowdfunding Treatment
description: Janet Weiss is helping with a GoFundMe for the cult post-hardcore band’s drummer to cover medical expenses and other living costs
author: Jazz Monroe

title: New Music Releases and Upcoming Albums in 2024 and 2025
description: A regularly updated guide to the new albums, EPs, mixtapes, and projects getting released in the coming weeks and months
author: Pitchfork

title: Bill Callahan and Noah Cyrus Join Everything Is Recorded on New Song: Listen
description: Richard Russell’s project invites an unlikely duo to feature on “Porcupine Tattoo”
author: Jazz Monroe

title: The Cure, Laura Marling, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
description: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat
author: Pitchfork

title: Achim Szepanski, Founder of Influential Electronic Labels Mille Plateaux and Force Inc., Dies at 67
description: Szepanski released landmark ambient albums by the likes of Gas and Oval while maintaining principles drawn from his work as a philosopher
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Oasis Add North American Dates to 2025 Reunion Tour
description: In addition to their UK leg, the Gallagher brothers will bring their long-awaited comeback concerts to Canada, the United States, and Mexico
